Reviews.Title: The best Camera I ever had !
Reviews.Author: Ali Rafiaie "Mig2000"
Reviews.Content: This camera has everything. What ever you can imagine WHICH you can put it in your pocket. The low light is awesome. Thank you Sony and looking forward to see Rx-200.

Reviews.Title: Excellent camera that fits in your pocket
Reviews.Author: J. Shen
Reviews.Content: Upgraded from my Canon G12 to the Sony RX100 II.  Still learning to use the camera and its functions but overall excellent shots in low light and great to use for group photos.  Easy to crop pictures.  Haven't used the zoom yet.

ProductInfo.Features:
Sony DSC-RX100M II Cyber-shot Digital Still Camera 20.2MP, Black
Sony Battery NP_BX1
LexSpeed 64GB SDXC Class 10 Memory Card
ProductInfo.Name: Sony Cyber-shot Digital Camera RX100 II + Sony Battery + 64GB
